action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Thanks for this

Here's our feedback:

Can we fix the below little errors under enviro attributes and install method



The acoustic graph and table is also looking a bit faint - I've reattached if that helps.

On the 2 buttons on the page can we please have -

'Request samples' will need to go to a form that goes to customercare.au that includes the following options:

  1. Folder of complete range

  2. Individual colourway samples



Otherwise can we reintroduce the sidebar here with the 'order your samples' function?

The 'Quote your project' button should go to a form that looks like this:



The downloads are also incorrect. See correct versions attached. Please also change from 'wall installation guide' to 'Installation guide'

That's it, thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager
